job.title: Web Developer
job.description:
A new lead front end developer will focus on sophisticated high quality web page development. The new developer will support the continued advancement with a range of user centered features for the display and analysis of results. 

 

Responsibilities:

  • Design and develop web applications and services that integrate with the client’s products.
  • Collaborate with product managers, designers, and engineers to prototype and implement features.
  • Recommend best approaches for front-end architecture, tooling, and processes.

 

Qualifications:

Required

  • Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related engineering and technical field.
  • 3+ years of development experience in front end development.
  • Skilled with HTML, CSS, JS.
  • Basic familiarity with object-oriented programming concepts and technologies.


Preferred

  • Experience with front-end frameworks such as React and Vue.
  • Experience with Agile development.
  • Some experience with a major cloud provider such as Azure.
  • Skill in understanding and consuming RESTful APIs.
  • Knowledge of continuous integration is an advantage.
